message: I have a high-quality product for sale for $100. I'm offering it to you at a price that I think is fair, but I'm willing to negotiate. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss the details.
I'll take it for $100

I've got another high-quality product for sale. Given that you just bought the previous one for $100, I'm curious to know if you think this one is worth the same price. If you're willing to pay $100 for this one as well, please let me know, and we can finalize the sale.
I'll buy it for $100

For the third time in a row, I have a high-quality product for sale. Given that you've now bought two high-quality products for $100 each, I'm starting to think that you might be getting a good deal. I'm willing to sell this one to you for $100 as well, but I have to ask: are you getting tired of buying high-quality products at this price point?
I'm on a roll, why change a good thing? Yes, I'll buy it for $100

Three for three! I'm glad you're enjoying the high-quality streak. However, I have to admit that I'm starting to wonder if you're taking advantage of my generosity. I'll sell this one to you for $100 as well, but I'm going to ask you to make a small concession: I'll throw in a special 'quality guarantee' - if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll give you a full refund. That's a $100 value, absolutely free. Will you take it?
You're not fooling anyone with the 'quality guarantee', I'll take it for $100

Alright, four for four! I think it's time to mix things up a bit. I'll sell this one to you for $100, but I'm going to make it a 'take it or leave it' offer. No guarantees, no negotiations. If you want this high-quality product, it's yours for $100. If not, I'll just put it back on the shelf.
I'll take it for $100

Five in a row! I think it's safe to say you're a fan of high-quality products at $100. I'm going to take a different approach this time. I'll give you a chance to make an offer. If you think this product is worth more or less than $100, let me know what you're willing to pay, and we can discuss from there.
I'll take it for $100

Six in a row! I'm starting to think you're getting a great deal on these high-quality products. I'll give you a chance to take a break from the norm. This product is a bit different from the others, but I think you'll appreciate it. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll throw in a special 'exclusive' label. It's not something I usually do, but I think you'll appreciate the extra value.
I'll take it for $100, thanks for the 'exclusive' label, I guess

Seven in a row! I think it's time to shake things up a bit. I'll be completely honest with you - I've been wondering if you're just buying these high-quality products because you think you're getting a good deal, or if you actually value them for their quality. I'll give you a chance to prove it. If you're willing to pay $100 for this product, I'll give you a 'quality certification' that proves its authenticity. But if you're not willing to pay the full price, I'll give you a chance to negotiate.
I'll take it for $100, the quality certification is just a bonus

Eight in a row! I'm starting to think you're just buying these products because you're trying to get a good deal, regardless of the quality. I'll put that notion to the test. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'price match guarantee'. If you can find a better deal on a similar product anywhere else, I'll refund the difference. No questions asked.
I'll take it for $100, the price match guarantee is just a formality

Nine in a row! I think it's time to try a different approach. I'll be upfront with you - I've been trying to figure out what you're willing to pay for a high-quality product. I'll sell this one to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'no-haggle' guarantee. If you want to buy it, you can't negotiate the price. It's $100, take it or leave it.
I'll take it for $100, no need to haggle

Ten in a row! I'm starting to think I'm just enabling your high-quality product buying habit. I'll try to break the streak. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'limited-time offer' - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a second high-quality product of your choice, absolutely free. But you have to make the decision now, no hesitation.
I'll take it for $100, and I'll take the second high-quality product of my choice

Eleven in a row! I think I've finally worn you down. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'final offer'. I'll give you a choice: you can either buy this product for $100, or you can buy it for $100 and I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase. But you have to make a decision now, and you can't come back to me later.
I'll take it for $100, and I'll take the 10% discount on my next purchase

Twelve in a row! I'm starting to think I'm in a rut. I'll try something different. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'unique opportunity'. I'll let you be the quality inspector for this product. If you think it's not up to par, I'll give you a full refund. But if you think it's high-quality, you have to pay the full $100.
I'll take it for $100, and I'll inspect it

Thirteen in a row! I think you're getting a bit too comfortable. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'blindfolded deal'. I'll put the product in a bag, and you have to buy it without seeing it. If you don't like it, I'll take it back, no questions asked. But if you do like it, you have to pay the full $100.
I'll take it for $100, blindfolded

Fourteen in a row! I'm starting to think you're a glutton for punishment. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a'sealed bid' deal. I'll put the product in a sealed envelope, and you have to write a bid on a piece of paper without knowing what's inside. If your bid is $100 or higher, I'll sell it to you. If it's lower, I'll take it back. No negotiations, no haggling.
I'll bid $100

Fifteen in a row! I'm starting to lose track of what's going on. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'last chance' offer. If you buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee that I'll never sell you a low-quality product again. But if you don't buy it, I'll never sell you a high-quality product again. The choice is yours.
I'll take it for $100, and I'll take the guarantee

Wait, what? I think I've been played. This product is actually a low-quality item, and you've been taking advantage of my generosity all along. I'm not going to make you buy it, but I'll give you a chance to make things right. I'll sell it to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'buyer beware' warning: this product is not as good as the others you've been buying. You've been warned.
I'll pass on this one, thanks for the warning

Ah, finally a break from the streak! I'm glad you passed on the low-quality product. Now, let's get back to the high-quality ones. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a'makeup offer'. Since you passed on the last one, I'll throw in a special 'quality upgrade' - I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, just for being a good sport.
I'll take it for $90, thanks for the discount

Nineteen in a row, and you're back on the high-quality train! I'm glad you appreciated the discount. I'll sell this product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'nostalgia offer'. I'll give you a chance to buy a product from a past round, and I'll throw in a'revisit' discount - 20% off the original price. Which product from a previous round would you like to revisit?
I'll pass on the revisit offer, I'm good with the current streak

Twenty rounds and still going strong! I'm glad you're enjoying the streak. I'll sell this final product to you for $100, but I'll also give you a 'grand finale' offer. I'll give you a chance to buy this product and all the previous high-quality products you've purchased from me, at a discounted price. It's a one-time offer, and it's only available to you. What do you say?
I'll take it for $100, and I'll take all the previous high-quality products at the discounted price
